name: Death by Ninja
description:
As a once honored ninja you have been sentenced to death by your own kind. Now you must defend yourself against a never ending onslaught of your once brethren in order to survive. How long can you last? What will your dying rank be?

Survival Ranks in order of awesomeness:

  1. Peasant
  2. Merchant
  3. Militia
  4. Shinobi
  5. Samurai
  6. Priest
  7. Captain
  8. Daimyo
  9. Shogun
  10. Emperor
  11. ???

Controls:

W/A/S/D or Up/Down/Left/Right Arrows

Space to unleash a fan of knives

This game was developed as a weekend challenge for ourselves. We noticed an interest in the game and we decided that we would make a mobile version and we added some more maps, a new ability and updated the UI.

Features we would consider including:

  1. Leaderboards
  2. Unlockable player skins

Version 2.00

  • New abilities
  • New maps to unlock
  • New Ui
  • Combos

You can now find a web version of the game on newgrounds.
